code: export const FOURSEAM={name:'4Seamer',description:'85-105 mph | Fastest, straightest pitch. Little to no movement.',photo:'/pitches/4seamfastball.png'};export const TWOSEAM={name:'2Seamer',description:'80-90 mph | Also known as a Sinker. Moves downward, and depending on the release, will sometimes run in on a RHH',photo:'/pitches/2seam.png'};export const CUTTER={name:'Cutter',description:'85-95 mph | Breaks away from a RHH as it reaches the plate. Mix of a slider and a fastball. Faster than a slider but with more movement than a fastball.',photo:'/pitches/cutter.png'};export const SPLITTER={name:'Splitter',description:'80-90 mph | Looks like a fastball but drops off the table as it reaches the plate.',photo:'/pitches/splitter.png'};export const FORK={name:'Forkball',description:'75-85 mph | Like a splitter, but with a less dramatic, more gradual downward movement.',photo:'/pitches/forkball.png'};export const CURVEBALL={name:'Curveball',description:'70-80 mph | Breaks down and away from a RHH. Slower than a slider with more movement. Commonly called a 12-6 curveball. The 12-6 refers to the top to bottom movement',photo:'/pitches/curve.png'};export const SLIDER={name:'Slider',description:'80-90 mph | Breaks down and away from a RHH. Between a fastball and a curve.',photo:'/pitches/slider.png'};export const SLURVE={name:'Slurve',description:'70-80 mph | 11-5 movement. Similar to a curve but with more lateral movement.',photo:'/pitches/slurve.png'};export const SCREWBALL={name:'Screwball',description:'70-80 mph | Breaks down and in on a RHH. 1-7 movement. Opposite of the slurve.',photo:'/pitches/screwball.png'};export const CHANGEUP={name:'Changeup',description:'70-85 mph | Looks like a fastball but is much slower. Slows down the batter’s timing.',photo:'/pitches/changeup.png'};export const PALMBALL={name:'Palmball',description:'65-75 mph | Ball is gripped tightly in palm. Just like a changeup, this pitch is slower than a fastball, but thrown with the same arm motion.',photo:'/pitches/palmball.png'};export const CIRCLECHANGE={name:'Circle Changeup',description:'70-80 mph | A changeup with 1-7 moment like the screwball.',photo:'/pitches/2seam.png'};
